${ModID}:GoldAxe.NAME: Gold Axe
${ModID}:GoldAxe.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fasten.NAME: Fasten
${ModID}:Fasten.DESCRIPTION: Defend cards gain !M! additional Block when played.

${ModID}:Bully.NAME: Bully
${ModID}:Bully.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each Vulnerable on the enemy.

${ModID}:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
${ModID}:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put a random Attack from your *Discard *Pile into your *Hand and Upgrade it.

${ModID}:Cinder.NAME: Cinder
${ModID}:Cinder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the top 2 cards in your *Draw *Pile.

${ModID}:Unrelenting.NAME: Unrelenting
${ModID}:Unrelenting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Attack you play costs 0.

${ModID}:Breakthrough.NAME: Breakthrough
${ModID}:Breakthrough.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${ModID}:CarveGhost.NAME: Carve Ghost
${ModID}:CarveGhost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! KEYWORD:Souls into your *Hand.

${ModID}:Putrefy.NAME: Putrefy
${ModID}:Putrefy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
${ModID}:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL If they have KEYWORD:Doom, deal another 5.

${ModID}:Friendship.NAME: Friendship
${ModID}:Friendship.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a KEYWORD:Soul, KEYWORD:Summon !M!.

${ModID}:NegativePulse.NAME: Negative Pulse
${ModID}:NegativePulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! KEYWORD:Doom to all enemies.

${ModID}:Fearmonger.NAME: Fearmonger
${ModID}:Fearmonger.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply KEYWORD:Doom this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:TimesUp.NAME: Time's Up!
${ModID}:TimesUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemies KEYWORD:Doom. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GraveWarden.NAME: Grave Warden
${ModID}:GraveWarden.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! KEYWORD:Soul into your *Hand.

${ModID}:DrainPower.NAME: Drain Power
${ModID}:DrainPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your *Hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Oblivion.NAME: Oblivion
${ModID}:Oblivion.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's KEYWORD:Doom. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FanOfKnifes.NAME: Fan of Knifes
${ModID}:FanOfKnifes.DESCRIPTION: *Shivs now hit all enemies. Add !M! *Shivs into your *Hand.

${ModID}:Hellraiser.NAME: Hellraiser
${ModID}:Hellraiser.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card containing "Strike", it is played against a random enemy.

${ModID}:BlightStrike.NAME: Blight Strike
${ModID}:BlightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply KEYWORD:Doom equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:BoneShards.NAME: BoneShards
${ModID}:BoneShards.DESCRIPTION: if KEYWORD:Osty is alive, he deals !M! damage to ALL enemies and you gain !B! Block. NL KEYWORD:Osty dies.

${ModID}:Neurosurge.NAME: Neurosurge
${ModID}:Neurosurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL At the start of your turn, apply 3 KEYWORD:Doom to yourself.

${ModID}:GraveWarden2.NAME: Grave Warden
${ModID}:GraveWarden2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a KEYWORD:Soul into your *Draw *Pile.

${ModID}:SculptingStrike.NAME: Sculpting Strike
${ModID}:SculptingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Ethereal to a card in your *Hand.

${ModID}:Transfigure.NAME: Transfigure
${ModID}:Transfigure.DESCRIPTION: Add KEYWORD:Replay to a card in your *Hand. NL It costs an extra [E] . NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ThrummingHatchet.NAME: Thrumming Hatchet
${ModID}:ThrummingHatchet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, return this to your *Hand.

${ModID}:RollingBoulder.NAME: Rolling Boulder
${ModID}:RollingBoulder.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies and increase this damage by !M!.

${ModID}:FlickFlack.NAME: Flick-Flack
${ModID}:FlickFlack.DESCRIPTION: KEYWORD:Sly. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${ModID}:MasterPlanner.NAME: Master Planner
${ModID}:MasterPlanner.DESCRIPTION: When you play a Skill, it gains KEYWORD:Sly.

${ModID}:Cruelty.NAME: Cruelty
${ModID}:Cruelty.DESCRIPTION: Vulnerable enemies take an additional !M!% damage.

${ModID}:Charge.NAME: CHAAARGE
${ModID}:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Block to all enemies.
